PORTFOLIO

Here are some
projects we've done

Select Clients

Live streaming service. The service is currently down because client took it offline. The service allowed musicians to live stream themselves while accepting tips and donations. Built in ReactJS and Django with Wowza for streaming

Time to deliver: 3 months

Live video chat server. Video chat is currently down because client stopped paying for the video server. Built on ReactJS and Node, also includes chat service, collaborative coding, and document sharing. WebRTC for video chat.

Time to deliver: 1 months

Marketplace for people to buy and sell food. Utilizes ReactJS and Django with Stripe API for payments. Ecommerce site that has a fully functional two sided marketplace with a checkout flow and listing flow.

Time to deliver: 2 months

Landing page for Lunyr, a new place for knowledge sharing that's built on top of the Ethereum blockchain. Built in ReactJS and full of interactive animations utilizing canvas.js and fullpage.js.

Time to deliver: 2 weeks

Lunyr's alpha / beta app. Their tag line is the "Future of Knowledge Sharing". Think Wikipedia but backed by the ethereum blockchain and users get rewarded for sharing information. Built the full frontend in ReactJS and also built out a large portion of the backend in Go. Worked with web3.js, truffle, IPFS, and a bunch of decentralized systems + blockchain systems.

Time to deliver: 1.5 months initially, now totaling 6 months

Webapp for SafeSign. They're building the future's trusted authentication and verification service, starting with a document signing app. Built the app with ReactJS, Django, Postgres, and wrapped it together on AWS with Docker.

Time to deliver: 3 months

KND CodePress app. Built utilizing React Native + Django backend. App live on Android + Apple iOS. A user can practice coding interviews on the go by completing practice coding interview problems. We give skeleton code, and the user fills in the blanks as they go.

Time to deliver: 2 months

CodePress's website. Here we teach CS majors how to be software engineers. Built utilizing React.js + Docker + Django backend, hosted on AWS. We bring users through a specialized course and at the end of the course, a user will have a full project built out in React + Django with all of industries best practices.

Time to deliver: 2 weeks and ongoing!
